description: Try our easy to follow Mini Plum Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Plum Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rub remaining almond meal, sugar and butter together until crumbly. Sprinkle over pies. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden. Cool in tin for 10 minutes, then carefully lift out onto plates. Serve with extra plum slices and thickened cream.
